title: Add motorcycle reviews section and redesign logo

requirements.text: Create a new backend data model for motorcycle reviews (distinct from gear reviews) with fields for motorcycle model, manufacturer, year, rating (1-5 stars), review text, reviewer name, and publication date

quotes: Add a section for motorcycle reviews

acceptanceCriteria: A new MotorcycleReview type is defined in backend/main.mo with all specified fields
Backend provides public functions to add and retrieve motorcycle reviews
Motorcycle reviews are stored separately from gear reviews
Reviews are sorted by publication date in descending order

requirements.text: Create a motorcycle reviews submission form that allows users to submit new motorcycle reviews with fields for motorcycle model, manufacturer, year, star rating selector, review text area, and reviewer name

quotes: Add a section for motorcycle reviews

acceptanceCriteria: Form includes all required input fields with appropriate validation
Star rating selector allows users to select 1-5 stars
Form submission successfully creates a new motorcycle review in the backend
Success message is displayed upon successful submission
Form follows the existing design system and styling patterns

requirements.text: Create a motorcycle reviews listing page that displays all motorcycle reviews with search functionality, filtering options, and sorting capabilities (newest, oldest, highest rated)

quotes: Add a section for motorcycle reviews

acceptanceCriteria: Page displays all motorcycle reviews in a grid layout
Search bar filters reviews by motorcycle model or manufacturer
Sort dropdown allows sorting by newest, oldest, and highest rated
Each review card shows motorcycle model, manufacturer, year, rating, and preview text
Clicking a review card navigates to the detailed review page
Loading states and empty states are handled appropriately

requirements.text: Create individual detail pages for motorcycle reviews that display full review content, motorcycle specifications (model, manufacturer, year), star rating, reviewer information, and publication date

quotes: Add a section for motorcycle reviews

acceptanceCriteria: Detail page shows complete motorcycle review information
Star rating is displayed prominently
Motorcycle specifications are clearly organized
Page layout is consistent with existing detail pages (ReviewDetail.tsx pattern)
Navigation back to motorcycle reviews list is provided

requirements.text: Add 'Motorcycles' navigation link to the main menu in Navigation.tsx and update routing in App.tsx to include routes for motorcycle reviews listing, submission form, and detail pages

quotes: Add a section for motorcycle reviews

acceptanceCriteria: Navigation bar includes a 'Motorcycles' link positioned logically in the menu
Routes are configured for /motorcycles, /motorcycles/:id, and /submit-motorcycle-review
All routes render the correct components
Mobile hamburger menu includes the new navigation item

requirements.text: Update the homepage (Home.tsx) to include a featured motorcycle reviews section that showcases the latest motorcycle reviews alongside existing gear reviews and videos

quotes: Add a section for motorcycle reviews

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays a dedicated section for featured motorcycle reviews
Section shows 3-4 latest motorcycle reviews in a visually appealing layout
Section heading clearly identifies it as motorcycle reviews
Layout maintains consistency with existing featured sections
Click-through navigation to full motorcycle reviews list is provided

requirements.text: Redesign the site logo to be more visually attractive and modern while maintaining brand recognition for a motorcycle review platform

quotes: change the logo and make it attractive

acceptanceCriteria: New logo image is generated and placed in frontend/public/assets/generated/
Logo reflects the motorcycle/motorsports theme
Logo works well in both light and dark theme modes
Logo is updated in Navigation.tsx component
Logo maintains appropriate dimensions for the navigation bar

constraints: Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts
Maintain the single-actor architecture in backend/main.mo
Follow existing naming conventions and patterns from gear reviews implementation
nonGoals: Modifying existing gear review or video functionality
Adding authentication requirements for motorcycle review submission
Adding image upload functionality for motorcycles

required: Modern motorcycle-themed logo with sleek typography and motorsports aesthetic, optimized for navigation bar display (logo.dim_200x60.png)
